title: Shortcut Toum (Garlic Sauce)
description: Quick Lebanese garlic sauce made with mayonnaise, perfect for dipping and spreading
ingredients: ½ cup mayonnaise (full-fat works best — Greek yogurt can work too, but it's tangier)
2 garlic cloves, finely grated or crushed into paste (microplane works best)
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together mayo, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, and salt.
Taste and adjust — more lemon for tang, more garlic if you want it spicy-garlic strong.
Chill until serving (flavour deepens after 15–20 minutes).
notes: Makes about ½ cup. For best flavor, let it sit for 15-20 minutes before serving to allow the garlic flavor to develop.
